column4: I highly suspect that giulia27 does *not* want to make a bootable drive, but rather mistakenly thinks that a drive being "bootable" has something to do with it mounting automatically via nautilus when they plug it in.
Right now their drive is not showing up in the output of "sudo parted -l" at all.
maybe you are right .... it`s not the same thing <mounting> a drive and making it <bootable> ...
